Articles.Content:
I transferred my KSP to the wrong steam account and don't remember how to get it transferred out of it. how do I transfer it out?

Any help is greatly appreciated.

You should contact Steam Customer Support and explain the situation. As far as I've seen, they're very helpful and can often get the problem fixed same day.

Good luck!
Since basically transfering to Steam is just using a Steam Key, I don't know if there is a way to transfer to a different account. As stated above, your best bet is to contact Steam themselves.
